scripts.postinstall: concurrently -c "yellow,magenta,green,blue" -n "example-google-adapter,example-yahoo-adapter,dapplet,example-virtual-adapter" "cd example-google-adapter && npm i" "cd example-yahoo-adapter && npm i" "cd dapplet-feature && npm i" "cd example-virtual-adapter && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently -c "yellow,magenta,green,blue" -n "example-google-adapter,example-yahoo-adapter,dapplet,example-virtual-adapter" "cd example-google-adapter && npm start" "cd example-yahoo-adapter && npm start" "cd dapplet-feature && npm start" "cd example-virtual-adapter && npm start"
